name: Overcharged (Hero10_)
description:
This Is the game made for the GE Game Jam #4!

Controls:

 WAD or arrow keys to move, E or Enter to interact, Left click or R to attack, Enter, Space or Left click to continue dialogue

It was made in about 2 weeks with the theme Overpowered.

A broken lab experiment must fight its way out of the game whilst the devs try their hardest to stop them...
